description:
No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/
القران الكريم كاملاً دون الاتصال بالانترنت وهو مطابق للمصحف الورقي تماماً مع العديد من الميزات المفيدة.

description:
GoodNovel- A Must Have App For Web Novels！
- Book Genres: Romance, Mystery, Fantasy, Western, Sci-fi, Fan-fic
- Become An Author to REALIZE YOUR WRITING DREAM
Collection of Best Books & Hottest New Reads in Every Genre!

GoodNovel has collected popular web novels and books, provides you with the latest chapters of the highest quality. This is a must-have book app for the majority of web novel lovers.

Start reading your favorite book, by downloading the GoodNovel app！

- No.1 Book Reading Platform for Novel Lovers
- Numerous of Book Genres for Choosing Freely
- Hundreds of web novel Read More Than 1,000,000+ Times
- Professional Author Team Creates Best Novel

Book Genres
GoodNovel contains many web novel genres,  from urban books to supernatural books, and is deeply loved by the majority of our readers.

So many book genres await you to explore on GoodNovel App.

Anyone can find their favorite web novel on GoodNovel. Start reading web novel without delay!

Hottest Web Novels
If you’re looking for any of these web novels below, then you’ll love GoodNovel for sure.
-「Most Read 5 Web Fictions 2024」

-「Top 5 Novels of All Web Fiction Platforms」

Trending web novel at GoodNovel:

 - 「Alpha Asher」By Jane Doe
 - 「The Divorced Billionaire Heiress」By I Wanna Eat Meat

 - 「His Dark Obsession」By Moonlight Muse

GoodNovel has hundreds of books that have been read more than 1 million times, and you can read these novels as much as you want without having to buy the paperback edition!

Topping Author Team
Our GoodNovel authors are from all over the world, with experience and talent in writing stories of many different genres and update frequently for their fans to read over and over again.

GoodNovel has been continuously recruiting high-quality authors and has a steady stream of new content recommendations.

**Join GoodNovel & Become A Professional Author!**

About Payment
GoodNovel is unfortunately not a totally free online novel platform. Because we at GoodNovel need to ensure that our authors can obtain a stable income to produce better quality content for you to read.

At the same time, GoodNovel has a lot of in-app tasks that you can easily complete to obtain coins to continue reading new chapters.

If you have any dissatisfaction with the charges or feedback, please write an email to contact@goodnovel.com

How To Contact Us

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodNovel Bundle to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

Service 
https://m.goodnovel.com/other/static_file/term_of_use.html
Privacy

Abjjad is the first of it’s kind reading app in the Arab world, offering you the best reading experience on your phone with the feel of the paper book in your hands. Now you can say goodbye to poor quality pdf books, with a library of over 20000 Arabic books and novels to choose from, we have everything, from new releases to the most popular book titles. 

Why Abjjad?

• With Abjjad you can read as many books as you like from a library packed with 20000+ Arabic books and novels for the price of 1 paper book. 

• Save up your internet data. Download books from the app to your phone within seconds & read offline wherever you go. 

• New books are added all the time. We are constantly working with new publishers to add more books and grow our library. 

• Don’t miss out on the feel of the paper book in your hands. With Abjjad you can flip the pages of the book and highlight the parts you like.. reading on your phone has never felt this natural. 

• Night mode feature for less eye strain and easier, comfortable reading.

• Connect with other readers. With a community of over 1.5 million readers, you can enjoy reading reviews and quotes written by others and comment or add your own.

• Follow your favorite writers & stay up-to-date with their latest published books.

• Create your own personal library by categorizing and adding books to your reading shelves.

• Our intuitive app is extremely easy to use, and provides you with the ability to highlight, bookmark & add notes inside the book.

• We strive to meet the tastes of all Arab readers, our library includes books of different genres like: stories, novels, biographies, literature, philosophy, psychology, history, politics, religion, self help books, etc.


How can you use Abjjad?

• Free Subscription:
Limited access to a number of books

• Abjjad Unlimited:
Unlimited access to all books on Abjjad (over 28000 books) for the price of 1 paper book. 

• Need help or got questions? We are always happy to hear from you on feedback@abjjad.com

Abjjad Unlimited Legal Details:
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Subscription will be automatically renewed every 1 month unless canceled
• Privacy policy: https://www.abjjad.com/static/privacy
• Terms & conditions:https://www.abjjad.com/static/terms
• Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

أفضل تطبيق لختم القرآن في المدة التي تريدها، بالإضافة إلى مواقيت الصلاة والأذكار والقبلة - أكثر من 18 مليون مستخدم.
Khatmah App is your daily Quran reader providing you with Prayer Times, Mushaf, Athkar, and Qibla - used by over 18 million users.

تطبيق ختمة يساعدك على ختم القرآن الكريم حيث يقدم لك وردك اليومي حسب المدة التي تريد أن تختم المصحف فيها، كما يقوم بتنبيهك يوميا لتذكيرك بالورد في الوقت الذي تحدده.

مزايا التطبيق:
- إمكانية تحديد مدة الختمة أو كمية الورد الذي تود قراءته يوميا
- قراءة الورد من داخل التطبيق (من مصحف مدقق من مجمع الملك فهد ذو جودة عالية)
- تحديد وقت المنبه اليومي للتذكير بالورد
- أذكار الصباح والمساء وغيرها
- تصفح القرآن حسب السور أو الأجزاء
- منبه يومي للأذكار والسنن كسورة الكهف يوم الجمعة
- مواقيت الصلاة الدقيقة لجميع مدن العالم
- تنبيهات للأذان وقبل الأذان
- اتجاه القبلة
- 5 أنواع من الويدجت لعرض مواقيت الصلاة بسهولة
- إمكانية مشاركة الورد الحالي عبر شبكات التواصل

---------------------------

Khatmah App is your daily Quran reader, allowing you to finish reading the Quran in the number of days you want. Khatmah provides you with daily Quran sessions from a high-quality Mushaf, along with daily alarms to remind you of your Khatmah. Khatmah also provides you with accurate Prayer Times, Athkar, Adhan notifications, Qibla Locator, and Prayer Times widgets.

Iqraaly: Your go-to destination for audiobooks, novels, and Arabic storytelling.
Welcome to the world of Arabic audiobooks – a rich audio library of over 2,000 titles at your fingertips. Discover an immersive experience with professionally narrated books and stories you can listen to anytime, anywhere.
Join over 7 million listeners across the Arab world who trust Iqraaly for a unique audio journey. Explore a vast collection of audiobooks spanning every genre: romance, horror, historical fiction, social novels, and more. Enjoy works by celebrated authors like Naguib Mahfouz, Abbas El-Akkad, Mostafa Mahmoud, Ahmed Khaled Tawfik, Ghassan Kanafani, Dostoevsky, and many others – all in one app.

Our library also features Arabic podcasts, children’s stories, short stories, and insightful non-fiction, including exclusive free titles available only on Iqraaly.

Transform your phone into a personal audiobook hub. Whether you’re commuting, relaxing, or just looking for inspiration, Iqraaly delivers a high-quality listening experience with beautifully narrated content and a seamless user experience — all through the leading audiobook app in the Arab world. Enjoy thousands of Arabic and international titles anytime, anywhere, in a one-of-a-kind digital library.

Why choose Iqraaly?
Stream and download audiobooks directly to your phone

Trusted by over 7 million users across the Arab world

Find everything you're looking for in one easy-to-use app

What makes Iqraaly stand out?
A wide variety of genres and content:
Novels: Romance, Historical, Crime, Thriller, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Non-fiction: Self-help, Literature, History, Religion

Iconic authors like Naguib Mahfouz, Abbas El-Akkad, Ahmed Khaled Tawfik, Ghassan Kanafani, Dostoevsky, Ahmed Mourad, Radwa Ashour, Reem Bassiouney, Mirna El Mahdy, and many more
Arabic narrations of global literary works from authors like Orhan Pamuk and Eugen Youn
New audiobooks added regularly

Subscription Plans:

Unlock unlimited listening and premium features like speed control, bookmarks, background playback, and personalized favorites with a subscription plan that suits you — monthly, quarterly, or yearly.

Subscription Benefits:
Listen anytime, anywhere — even without an internet connection.
Enjoy newly added books every week.

Take advantage of all the app’s features designed to enhance your listening experience.

Download Iqraaly now and start listening to the latest exclusive Arabic audiobooks with the best audio experience.

Contact us:
contactus@iqraaly.com
تطبيق خيرة الصادق يسمح للمستخدم إدخال رقم الصفحة من القرآن الكريم لخيرته، ثم يعرض الخيرة على شاشة المستخدم.

Your Complete Spiritual Companion 
Holy Quran  is designed for Muslims seeking a seamless, all-in-one app for their spiritual needs. Whether you’re looking for prayer time muslim reminders, salah guide for beginners, or Dhikr tracking, this app brings everything together in a simple and easy-to-use interface. Stay connected with your faith anytime, anywhere. 

Key Features 
Automatic prayer time alarm for all five daily prayers. 
Accurate qibla direction finder for wherever you are. 
Full holy book Quran text for easy reading and recitation. 
High-quality Quran mp3 full offline access to 114 surahs. 
Digital tasbih counter to track your Dhikr effortlessly. 
Morning and evening azkar reminders to keep you spiritually connected. 
Learn and reflect on the 99 names of Allah with meanings and benefits. 

Never Miss a Prayer 
With Holy Quran, you’ll always stay on time for your prayers. The app automatically sends alerts for salah time like Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, ensuring you never miss an important moment of worship. And with the accurate qibla direction feature, you’ll always know the correct direction to pray, no matter where you are. 

Read and Listen to the Quran 
The app offers both a full al Quran text for easy reading and a complete audio version of all 114 surahs. Whether you prefer to read or listen, you can engage with the holy book Quran in a way that suits your lifestyle. The Quran audio mp3 feature ensures you can access it even when offline. 

Find the Qibla Instantly 
No need to worry about finding the Qibla while traveling or in unfamiliar places. The app’s highly accurate qibla compass direction helps you locate the exact direction for prayer with just one tap, whether you're using it offline or online. 

Simplified Dhikr & Spiritual Growth 
Use the built-in tasbeeh counter to keep track of your Dhikr easily and accurately. Whether you’re at home, traveling, or on the go, this feature helps you stay connected to your faith through daily remembrance. Additionally, explore the 99 names of Allah with meaning to gain deeper insight into their significance and benefits, further enriching your spiritual journey. 

What Sets Us Apart? 
Holy Quran - Deeper Journey offers more than just the basics. We combine offline Quran audio, easy-to-use prayer alarms, and a highly accurate qibla finder in one simple app. It’s designed to be your comprehensive Islamic companion, offering everything you need for your spiritual growth without the hassle of switching between multiple apps. 
Download Holy Quran today and take the next step in your spiritual journey with confidence. All your spiritual tools—prayer time table, Quran reading, and Dhikr tracking—are now in one place, easy, accessible, and reliable. 

Your review is our appreciation. We will try our best to respond to all your contributions and improve the app base on your contributions. Download the Al Quran Sharif Prayer Time and rate 5 our app will be your Islamic companion.


Policy link: https://sites.google.com/view/pp-holy-quran/home  
EULA link: https://sites.google.com/view/eula-holy-quran/home

Wahy - Your Complete Digital Quran for Recitation, Understanding, and Listening 

Wahy offers a seamless and comprehensive experience for reading, listening to, and understanding the Holy Quran in a modern and innovative way. With advanced features, you can interact with the Mushaf effortlessly—whether at the surah, verse, or word level. 

Why Choose Wahy? 

 - Hafs & Warsh Mushaf: Includes all editions from the King Fahd Complex, along with Warsh recitation. 
 - 64+ World-Renowned Reciters: Enjoy high-quality Quranic recitations by top Qaris. 
 - Word-by-Word Pronunciation: Helps with memorization and improving recitation. 
 - Smart Search by Spelling: Easily find verses with an intuitive search system. 
 - Comprehensive Tafsir (Exegesis): Access over 184 sources, including renowned commentaries and translations. 
 - Offline Mode: Download recitations and Tafsir for listening and reading without an internet connection. 
 - Illustrations & Augmented Reality: Deepen your understanding of Quranic meanings. 
 - Multi-Language Interface: Supports 34+ languages for a global user experience. 
 - Quran Reading Plans: Track your progress and complete your Khatmah. 
 - Bookmarks & Notes: Save reading positions and add personal reflections. 
 - Share Verses: Easily share ayahs along with their explanations as text or images. 
 - Auto-Scrolling Pages: For uninterrupted recitation. 
 - Instant Link Access: Quickly navigate to references within the Quran.

القرآن الكريم مع تفسير

تطبيقنا لقراءة القرآن يعطيكم تجربة ممتعة بواجهة بسيطة و أنيقة لقراءة القرآن الكريم وتفسيره على أجهزة هواتفكم الذكية والأجهزة اللوحية

مميزات التطبيق

• قرآن كامل مثل المصحف الحقيقي
• تفسير الميزان للعلامة الطباطبائي، الأمثل للشيخ ناصر مكارم الشيرازي، النور للشيخ محسن قرائتي و تفسير اهل البيت (روائي) لكل آية باللغة العربية
• تلاوة الآيات بصوت القراء المتعددة كل آية على حدة (عبدالباسط، المنشاوي، ميثم التمار و...)
• تفسير الصوتي الأمثل في تفسير كتاب الله المنزل (آية الله مكارم الشيرازي)، آية بآية
• عرض ترجمة كلمة بكلمة باللغة الإنجليزية والقدرة على تشغيل نطق الكلمات بشكل منفصل وبحسب اختيار المستخدم
• ختم القرآن: امكانية ايجاد ختمة على اساس كمية القراءة اليومية او تاريخ البدء والانتهاء
• القراءة الليلية
• ميزة البحث في نصوص القرآن
• البحث عن نص كامل خلال تفسير
• يمكنك وضع علامات لحفظ موقع تقدمك بالمصحف والوصول السريع لتلك المواقع
• يمكنك وضع علامات للآيات المفضلة لديك في قائمة المفضلة
• خيار لإضافة السور المطلوبة إلى القائمة المفضلة مع القدرة على تغيير ترتيبها
• يمكنك نسخ ولصق الآيات و مشاركتها في وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي
• مشاركة الملف الصوتي للتلاوة عبر مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي
• تكبير وتصغير كل صفحة في القران والتفسير
• تذكير للتلاوة اليومية للقرآن الكريم
• "العرض اليومي ل"آية اليوم
• تدوين ملاحظة لكل آية من القرآن
• أخذ نسخة احتياطية واستعاده
• دليل المستخدم

------------------------

Quran with Tafsir

Read and listen to Quran, and study and learn its tafsir.

Our Quran reader app gives you a pleasant experience with its intuitive interface and offers a stylish way to read Quran and its tafsir on your smartphones and tablets.

The app features: 

• Complete Quran like the actual Mus'haf
• Tafsir Almizan in Arabic by Allamah Tabatabaei, Tafsir Al-Amthal by Ayatollah Naser Makarem Shirazi, Tafsir Al-Noor by Sheikh Mohsen Qara'ati and Tafsir Ahl al‑Bayt (Hadith-Based) linked to each verse
• Verse-by-verse audio recitation by multiple reciters (Abdulbasit, Al-Minshawi, Maytham Al-Tammar,...)
• Arabic Audio Tafsir Al-Amthal (Ayatollah Makarem Shirazi), verse by verse
• Displaying word-by-word English translation for each ayah and ability to play the Arabic pronunciation of a word in an ayah
• Quran Khatmah based on the amount of daily recitation or start and end dates
• Night Mode option for an easier nighttime reading
• Full-text search throughout Quran
• Full-text search throughout Tafsir
• Bookmarks for marking your progress or quick access
• Favourites to mark verses that you like
• Option to add the desired Surahs to the Favourites list with the ability to change their order
• Copy/pasting a verse or sharing on social media
• Sharing audio files (Recitation) on social media
• Zoom in/Zoom out each page
• Reminder for daily recitation of Quran
• Daily display of "The Verse of The Day"
• Take note for each verse of Quran
• Backup and restore user's data
• App tour guide teaching you how to use the app features

Manga Cloud مانغا كلاود هو تطبيق مميز للمانغا باللغة العربية. يحتوي التطبيق على آلاف المانغات المتنوعة التي يمكن للمستخدمين استكشافها وقراءتها بسهولة. يمكنك تنظيم مكتبتك الخاصة من المانغات المفضلة، إضافة إلى إدارة قوائم "اقرأ لاحقًا"، "القراءة الحالية"، و"المانغات المكتملة".

يتيح لك التطبيق البحث عن المانغا باستخدام الوسوم المختلفة، والاطلاع على تفاصيل القصة والمعلومات المهمة الأخرى حول المانغا. يتميز Manga Cloud بتصميم جميل وسهل الاستخدام مع دعم للوضعين الليلي والنهاري لتجربة قراءة مثالية.

قم بتنزيل Manga Cloud الآن واستمتع بمكتبة ضخمة من المانغا في أي وقت وأي مكان!

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Make Learning Fun with Rody-Chick-Fun! Transform screen time into brain time! Rody-Chick-Fun is the perfect educational app designed to help children aged 4-10 develop essential cognitive skills through fun, engaging gameplay. WHY KIDS LOVE IT

Beautiful, colorful animations that capture attention
Instant feedback with celebration effects
No reading required - perfect for young learners
Achievable challenges that build confidence
Reward system with unlockable achievements
FOUR AMAZING GAMES Memory Cards
Find matching pairs in this classic memory game! 16 adorable emoji cards with smooth 3D flip animations help develop visual memory and concentration. Perfect for building focus and pattern recognition skills.Pattern Match
Watch, remember, and repeat! This Simon Says-style game challenges kids to memorize increasingly complex color sequences. Develops short-term memory, attention span, and sequential thinking. Color Match
Race against time to match colors! Fast-paced gameplay helps improve quick thinking, color recognition, and decision-making skills. Kids learn to process information quickly while having a blast. Shape Match
Find matching shapes and colors in this progressive puzzle game! Multiple difficulty levels adapt as your child improves, teaching logical thinking and problem-solving.
 TRACK PROGRESS
Individual best scores for each game
Total score tracking
6 unlockable achievement badges
Beautiful statistics charts
Celebrate every milestone!
 PARENT-APPROVED FEATURES
 100% Safe - No ads, no in-app purchases
 Privacy First - No data collection, completely offline
Age Appropriate - Designed specifically for ages 4-10
 Educational - Based on cognitive development principles
Screen Time Well Spent - Learning disguised as play
COPPA Compliant - Meets all child safety standards EDUCATIONAL BENEFITSCognitive Development:
Enhances short and long-term memory
Improves concentration and focus
Develops pattern recognition
Strengthens problem-solving abilities
Boosts processing speed

description:
BookTok: Fiction Reading App for All Fiction Lovers  
BookTok is an App for fiction reading, dedicated to serving all the fiction lovers!  

We have a variety of themes, including fantasy, martial arts, romance, urban, campus and so much more. Everything that you can think of is all here!  

We update the bookstore every day, releasing new chapters in seconds—it couldn’t be more convenient for readers! We also have various events awaiting you!  

We keep trying and revising, just to be your closest reading companion.  


Key Features  
【Massive Fictions】  
Cover popular online fictions with various lists and fine classification, including male and female sections, selected books, smart recommendations and more!  

【Quality Reading Experience】  
Customize your read with simulated 3D page turning, offline download, font switching, background adjustment and night mode. We present exquisite book covers, neat content layout, and many other delicate designs to ensure a good experience.  

【Personalized Service】  
Choose from various background colors, skins and fonts. Set your personal reader with a simple click.  

【Intelligent Synchronization】  
Reading progress and notes can be intelligently synchronized and saved in your account. No need to worry about changing devices.  


About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions  
Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.  
Billing period**: The Check-in Coins Packs are available on monthly, quarterly and yearly bases.  
Price:  
- Monthly: USD 7 and 13  
- Quarterly: USD 20 and 38  
- Yearly: USD 60 and 98  
Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.  
Renewal: When you subscribe to the Check-in Coins Pack, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel. Subscriptions are automatically charged each period (monthly or other), and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the start of each cycle.  
Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.  


 Important Links  
- Privacy Policy: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/RU/AppPrivacyPolicy.html?client_proid=193&mt=1  
- Subscription Terms and Conditions: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/RU/CheckinCard/agreement.html?client_proid=193&mt=1  
- Terms of Use: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/RU/service_term.html?client_proid=193&mt=1  


Contact Us  
For questions or advice, please email: SupportRU2@moboreader.com

Read stories and books that you loved and the stories that you’ll love!

Connect with your favourite writers.

Over 400,000 writers in 12 languages (many more coming soon) who have published over 8,000,000 stories across genres including love and romance, suspense and thriller, horror, moral stories, social stories, children's stories, humour, and satire. There are also thousands of poems, ghazals, nazms, autobiographies, and essays!

Stories by Pratilipi unlocks a world of public domain contents, allowing you to read the classic stories of human history. Connects you with the best storytellers and story readers. Read different types of books- Romance, Ghost & Horror, Biography, Suspense & Thriller, Mystery, Travel, Cooking, Science & Technology, Comedy, Politics, Women, Health, Children, Classic tales and much more. It's all here, along with tens of thousands of other literature with some of the best story-lines ever.

Our readers love us for having rating and reviews, author profiles, Night Mode for reading books, reading statistics - and all the other little things about books. Over 300,000 of the greatest stories you’ll ever read, accessible with the tap of your finger.

Choose your favourite format of storytelling - stories, e-books, poems, articles, magazines, novels, essay,  available over 8,000,000 contents.

Pratilipi stories are currently available in the following languages - 

Hindi, Tamil, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Telugu, Bengali, Malayalam, Odia, Punjabi, English

For full terms of service, visit https://english.pratilipi.com/terms-of-service

Read Comics, Manga, Webtoons, Manhwa & Manhua And More
- All the hottest comics are right here! You can read all kinds of comics, including Fantasy, Action, Romance, Horror, BL Manga (Boy’s Love), and more.
- We have manhwa and webtoon stories from Korea. We provide manhwa & webtoon fans with various genres of wonderful work.
- There also are manhua stories for you to read. You can find the latest and hottest manhua stories in different genres on MangaToon. Tales of Demons and Gods, Bossy President, Battle Through the Heavens and more iconic manhua arewaits you to read!

Read Free Comics
- At MangaToon, many of our comics require paying a unlocking fee to read. The reason is that manga creators also need to make a living. Only with manga fans' support, they can continue to create better comic storiess. Your support is the best motivation for them to create mangas.
- But MangaToon also provides plenty of free ways for readers to read manga for free. Every week, there are different comics released for manga readers to read for free.
- Also, You can get free comics, unlock them with points or reading vouchers. By completing platform tasks, you will receive a certain number of points and reading vouchers every week, which allows you get free comics.
- Even if you don't have points or manga vouches, you can still read free comics by watching a short video to unlock manga chapters.

Great Manga Reading Experience
- At MangaToon, you can not only read comics online but also download them for offline reading, allowing you to enjoy the fascinating world of manga anytime and anywhere.
- MangaToon is a manga reader designed specifically for mobile phone reading. You can scroll mangas & webtoons smoothly for an uninterrupted reading experience.
- We provide colorful manga and comic works on MangaToon, bring you a more immersive comic reading experience.
- Join our manga community and discuss everything about your favorite manga with millions of manga lovers!
- A vertical search tool for comics. You can search and read mangas like One Piece, Jujutsu Kaisen, Naruto and other hottest mangas.
- Pad version is also supported. Enjoy manga with a better screen on your pad!
- As a manga reader designed for manga fans all over the world, you can find mangas and stories in more than ten languages, including English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Indonesian Vietnamese and Thai. You can switch to other languages on the App's settings page to read comic stories.

Tell stories like chatting
- At MangaToon, in addition to reading comics, you can also find many exciting chat stories. Chat stories are a new form of novel where the story unfolds in the form of chatting. Chat stories have exciting plotlines, the world views full of imagination, and a more relaxed reading experience, allowing you to read stories as easily as chatting with a friend.
- A vast array of wonderful stories awaits you to discover, where you can see characters from One Piece chatting with each other, fanfiction stories about the personal stories of BTS members, and so on.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MangaToonEN/
Contact us by Email: support@mangatoon.mobi

Read iconic comic books like Superman, Batman, The Witcher, Invincible, The Boys, Transformers, Hellboy, The Walking Dead, The Umbrella Academy, and more—alongside exciting creator-made comics, manga, webcomics, and graphic novels.


NEW BOOKS DROP WEEKLY
Find new and interesting comics featured every week. Explore our library of 100,000+ releases through curated collections and see which comic books, creators, and themes are trending. Your next favorite is just a tap away.


GC VERTICAL ORIGINALS
Experience amazing comic book stories reimagined for vertical scroll. With over 1,200+ episodes across 30+ series, enjoy daily free episodes and new series weekly from top indie publishers and creators.


350+ PUBLISHERS AND THOUSANDS OF CREATORS
Enjoy comics from publishers including DC, Image Comics, Dark Horse, BOOM! Studios, ONI Press, TOKYOPOP, Mad Cave, and more. Read titles like Justice League, Superman, Nightwing, Joker, The Sandman, Stranger Things, Invincible, Power Rangers, Transformers, The Boys, The Walking Dead, and thousands more.


READING EXPERIENCE YOU'LL LOVE
Customize your experience—whether on phone or tablet, vertical scroll or double-page layout. Engage with comics your way, comment, follow creators, and jump between chapters with ease. For many titles, enjoy our panel-to-panel reading mode for a more cinematic experience.


ADVANCED SEARCH AND DISCOVERY
Find exactly what you’re looking for with powerful filtering by genre, art style, themes, format, audience, and more. Explore by dedicated publisher channels and discover new comic favorites beyond the algorithm.


OFFLINE READING
Take your comics on the go. Download and read offline with a GlobalComix Gold subscription.


TRACK TITLES & ORGANIZE COMICS
Bookmark your comic books with statuses like “Reading,” “On Hold,” or “Read Later.” Get notified about new releases from your favorite comics and creators.


CELEBRATE COMICS AND THE PEOPLE WHO CREATE THEM
GlobalComix is a creator-first platform where publishers and artists can publish directly and earn revenue. Up to 70% of your subscription fee supports the comics you love.


Join us and shape the future of comicbook storytelling.


If you’ve enjoyed reading on platforms like Comixology, you’ll find GlobalComix a fresh, modern experience—built for discovery, community, and reading your way.

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

Brought to you by Fetyaton Amanou and Designed & Developed by Massyve.tech, a beautiful and ad-free Holy Quran application with the latest available mobile technologies. The app is specially designed to both display and provide audio for the Holy Quran and its explanation by Sayid Abbas Ali Al Mousawi in a simple and interactive way.
We hope this app will increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. We will be working on updating the app regularly and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at support@massyve.tech

Key Features:
1- Browse by Soura & Juz'.
2- Listen to your favorite reciter from the wide variety of world famous reciters.
3- Read or listen to 3 different Quran explanations (أوضح البيان في تفسير القرآن للسيد عباس علي الموسوي, تفسير الميزان للسيد الطباطبائي, تفسير الأمثل الشيخ ناصر مكارم الشيرازي).
4- View "لفتة" for special golden verses.
5- Click on any green keyword to view its meaning.
6- View all keywords meanings for each a page.
7- Worldwide daily prayer times and notifications with full customization to your preference.
8- View Hijri time
9- Advanced search feature that can help you search for any word in different forms (الرحمن الرحيم, الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ, Allah), with instant auto search and the ability to search in the Quran explanations.
10- Scroll easily between pages, juz' or souwar.
11- Receive a random verse from the Holy Quran everyday that contains a "لفتة".
12- Bookmark and save your favorite pages or verses.
13- Verse highlighting during Quran recitation.
14- Copy or share one or multiple verse(s) from the Holy Quran or any tafseer.
15- Switch easily between tafseer and another.
16- Pinch to zoom and increase the font size.
17- Double click to use the app in full screen mode.
18- View Qibla direction.

Designed & Developed by Massyve.tech

It's smart algorithm increases your reading based on your performance!

app_name: Urdu to English - English to Urdu Dictionary
description:
Free "English to Urdu" & "Urdu to English Dictionary"


This is English - Urdu and Urdu - English Dictionary (اردو سے انگریزی لغت), containing 147,000 words for you.

Find meanings from thousands of words both in Urdu and English. Also search from phrases to enhance your English language. Use of different daily life words, phrases, idioms etc, is covered with full easy to learn grammar.

It is very useful app for new learners of English Language and different other competitive exams.

Features:

You can favorite a word to to easy access later and thus can learn it.

You can play sound of word in English

You can access history of all the searches you made, you can view dictionary of the history anytime you want, whether you are connected to the internet or not.

You can turn on اردو keyboard by following these steps

1- Press Home Button
2- Tap on Settings
3- Tap on General 
4- Tap on Keyboard 
5- Tap on Keyboards 
6- Tap on Add New Keyboard
7- Select “Urdu” from the list of Keyboards

Once above steps followed, you can toggle languages using the "world" icon on keyboard.

NOTE: We appreciate your feedback! Do write to us if u have suggestions/corrections!

This app consists of authentic du'as/ssupplications, remembrance/azkaar from the Quran and sunnah.

Most of this app is adapted from the popular book of authentic supplications, "Hisnul-Muslim" compiled by the Shaykh, Sa'eed Ibn Wahf Al-Qahtaanee. The rest of the supplications consist of Duas from the Qur'an and some other authentic duas from the sunnah, compiled from various mentioned sources.

Features
--------------
- Translation languages: ENGLISH, FRENCH, URDU, ROMAN URDU
- Transliterations to help those who are still learning arabic (Note: it is NOT recommended to rely on this and abandon learning arabic).
- Audio for each dua
- References for each dua
- Search for any dua
- Mark your favorites for easy access
- Umrah section - umrah duas compiled in a simple step-by-step guide form.
- 99 Names of Allaah
- Extra reading

＼ pixivコミックのここがすごい ／
● pixivコミック限定作品・書き下ろしの限定エピソードは850作品以上。
● 無料で読める漫画数は10,600作品以上。●ドラマ化した「みなと商事コインランドリー」や「おじさまと猫」、アニメ化した「休日のわるものさん」の最新話が無料で読めるのはここだけ！
● 世界最大イラストSNS「pixiv」に投稿されるオリジナルマンガから、pixivマンガ編集部が厳選したおすすめマンガも毎日紹介。未来のヒット作がここから生まれる！


＼ pixivコミックについてもっと知りたい ／
1億人が使う世界最大級のイラスト・マンガ投稿サイト「pixiv(ピクシブ)」の公式マンガアプリです。


■ 無料の連載作品が豊富！
無料で読める連載作品は10,600作品以上、月間更新作品は200作品以上も！いま話題のマンガがたくさん！
人気の異世界作品「悪役令嬢の中の人」のコミカライズや、ドラマ化もされた「30歳まで童貞だと魔法使いになれるらしい」、アニメ化された「クールドジ男子」などの話題作もお楽しみいただけます。


■ pixivコミック大人気作品はこちら！
･:*+.『WEBマンガ総選挙2023』第1位.:+
「みなと商事コインランドリー」


･:*+.『WEBマンガ総選挙2023』第3位.:+
「悪役令嬢の中の人
～断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします～」


･:*+.『WEBマンガ総選挙2023』第6位.:+
「お前、タヌキにならねーか？」


の最新話が無料で読めるアプリはpixivコミックだけ！




■ ポイントや待ち時間なし！連載作品読み放題！
公開中の連載マンガは待たずに無料で好きなだけ読むことができます。


■ pixivアカウントで便利な機能も！
pixivアカウントでログインすれば作品に「いいね！」や「ファンレター」を送ったり、作品をたくさん「フォロー」することができます。


■ pixivに投稿されたオリジナルマンガの作者を直接応援できる！
作品に「いいね！」を送ったり、作者さんを「フォロー」することで、
あたらしい更新や投稿を誰よりも早く知ることができます。
気に入った作品の作者さんには直接応援コメントを送ることもできます。


■ pixivマンガ編集部オススメの作品が毎日更新！
pixivに投稿されたオリジナルマンガから面白い作品のみ厳選し、pixivマンガ編集部からの一言をそえて毎日お届け！
少年マンガ/少女マンガ/王道の恋愛/ラブコメ/創作BL/4コマ/ギャグ/ファンタジー/学園マンガ/実話エッセイ/感動ものなど、幅広いジャンルのマンガを毎日読むことができます。
新たなヒット作が、ここから生まれるかも……!?


■pixivプレミアム


○pixivプレミアムについて
pixivプレミアムは、pixivにおいて人気順検索やブックマーク絞り込みなどの機能を利用できるプレミアムサービスです。


○価格について
1ヶ月600円（税込）の月額自動更新サービスです。


○期間について
pixivプレミアムの有効期限は申込日を基準にして1ヶ月です。
pixivプレミアムの有効期限終了日、登録プランが自動で更新され、Apple IDに登録プランの料金が請求されます。
自動更新を希望されない場合は、有効期限終了日の24時間以上前に設定から自動更新を解除してください。
 


○有効期限の確認と自動更新の解除について
[設定] > [iTunesとApp Store] > [Apple ID:XXXX] > [Apple IDを表示] > [サブスクリプション] の順番で設定画面へ進み、自動更新をオフにすることが可能です。
有効期限の確認もこの画面から行うことができます。
 


○キャンセルおよび払い戻しについて
当月分のキャンセルおよび払い戻しは受け付けておりません。
キャンセルを希望される方は、翌月以降の自動更新を解除してください。


○利用規約等
pixivプレミアムのご利用前に、以下の利用規約等をご確認ください。


・プライバシーポリシー
https://policies.pixiv.net/ja/privacy_policy.html 


・pixiv有料サービス利用規約
https://policies.pixiv.net/


■ pixivコミック公式サイト
https://comic.pixiv.net/


■ pixivコミック公式X
https://twitter.com/pixivcomic


■ pixiv
https://www.pixiv.net/
